tool_description: An API designed to generate random words for guessing games, allowing users to specify the number of words and their difficulty level.

api_list.name: Produce mixy words list
api_list.description: Generates a list of random words based on the specified amount and difficulty level.

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: The number of words to generate. Valid values are integers between 1 and 100.

optional_parameters.name: difficulty
optional_parameters.description: The difficulty level of the words. Valid values are 'easy', 'medium', and 'hard'.
